notes:
## What's New in Version 2.0.0

### New Features
- Zoom In/Out controls with persistence across app launches
- Automatic update checks on startup and periodic background checks
- 'Check for Updates' option added to Help menu for manual update checks

### Improvements
- Better window management
- Improved system tray integration

### Bug Fixes
- Resolved window focus issues on Windows
- Fixed zoom persistence across sessions
